constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数不超过给定的上限 q 以获得满分，不超过 Q 以获得非零分
constraints.formal: 0 <= x <= q for full score, 0 <= x <= Q for non-zero score

constraints.name: distinct_slopes
constraints.description: 所有直线的斜率互不相同（即两两不平行）
constraints.formal: a_i != a_j for all i != j

constraints.name: coordinate_bound
constraints.description: 查询点的坐标范围限制
